metadata.description: Create bilingual subtitles for your videos with Curifyâ€™s free AI-powered tool. Perfect for YouTube, TikTok, education, and global creators.

metadata.title: AI Video Dubbing Tool | Curify AI

metadata.title: About Curify | Vision, Technology & Team

metadata.title: Pricing Plans | Curify Studio

technicalDetails.ffmpegExample: ffmpeg -i storyboard_v1_timeline.mp4 -i storyboard_v1_voice.wav -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -shortest -vf subtitles=subtitles/storyboard_v1.srt exports/storyboard_v1_final.mp4

humanEvaluation.title: Human Evaluation of AI Output
humanEvaluation.introduction: While our AI pipeline is highly accurate, human evaluation remains a critical component of our quality assurance process. Here's how we ensure the highest quality output:
evaluationAreas: Scene Boundary Accuracy - Reviewing and adjusting scene transition points
Metadata Validation - Verifying AI-generated descriptions, tags, and labels
Consistency Check - Ensuring uniform style and formatting across all scenes
Content Accuracy - Validating that the AI correctly identified key elements in each scene

workflow.title: Human-in-the-Loop Workflow
steps: AI processes the video and generates initial storyboard
Human reviewers evaluate the AI output using our specialized tools
Reviewers provide feedback and make necessary adjustments
System learns from human corrections to improve future outputs

benefits.title: Benefits of Human Evaluation
items: Higher Accuracy - Human reviewers catch subtle nuances that AI might miss
Contextual Understanding - Better interpretation of cultural and situational context
Quality Assurance - Additional layer of validation for professional use cases
Continuous Improvement - Human feedback helps train and refine the AI models

tools.title: Evaluation Tools
tools.description: Our platform includes specialized tools to assist human reviewers:
features: Easy-to-use interface for adjusting scene boundaries
Bulk editing of metadata and tags

header.title: From Raw Footage to Storyboards
header.author: Curify AI Team
header.imageAlt: AI analyzing video scenes and generating storyboards
header.imageCaption: AI-powered scene detection in action, identifying key moments in video content
header.subtitle: AI-Powered Video Analysis

steps.videoProcessingPipeline: Our system processes videos through a sophisticated multi-stage pipeline that ensures accurate scene detection and analysis:
steps.step3Text: OpenCV-powered frame sampling at optimal intervals
steps.step4Text: Adaptive thresholding for precise scene boundary detection
steps.step5Text: Deep learning models for comprehensive scene understanding
steps.step6Text: Export metadata to JSON format for integration with other tools

modularArchitecture.title: Modular Architecture
modularArchitecture.description: The system is built with separate components for video analysis, AI processing, and output generation, making it easy to extend and maintain.

performance.title: Performance Optimized
performance.description: Efficient frame processing and parallelization ensure fast analysis even for long videos.

aiEnhanced.title: AI-Enhanced Analysis
aiEnhanced.description: Optional AI components provide deeper scene understanding and more accurate labeling.

intro.p1: In today's fast-paced content creation landscape, efficient video analysis is no longer a luxuryâ€”it's a necessity. Our AI-powered scene detection technology transforms hours of raw footage into structured, searchable content in minutes, not days.
intro.p2: Whether you're a filmmaker, content creator, or media professional, understanding the power of automated scene detection can revolutionize your workflow and unlock new creative possibilities.

SceneDetection.proTip: For best results, ensure your source video has clear audio and visual separation between scenes. Well-lit environments and minimal background noise significantly improve detection accuracy.

inceptionExample.title: Dream Level Analysis: Inception Scene Breakdown
inceptionExample.description: Explore how our AI analyzes the complex dream layers and visual effects in Inception:
inceptionExample.analysisText: Dream layer detection and visual effect breakdown

step1.title: 1. Video Analysis
step1.description: Our AI scans your video frame by frame, analyzing visual and audio cues to identify potential scene boundaries.
details: Analyzes color histograms and motion vectors
Detects audio level changes and silences

step2.title: 2. Scene Segmentation
step2.description: The system groups related shots into coherent scenes based on visual and temporal relationships.
details: Uses machine learning to understand scene context
Considers shot duration and transition types
Merges related shots into logical scenes

step3.title: 3. Content Classification
step3.description: Each detected scene is analyzed and categorized based on its visual and audio content.
details: Identifies key visual elements and objects
Classifies scene type (e.g., interview, action, landscape)
Analyzes audio for speech, music, and effects

step4.title: 4. Metadata Generation
step4.description: Comprehensive metadata is generated for each scene, enabling powerful search and organization.
details: Extracts key dialogue and audio cues

whyItWorks.title: Why Our Scene Detection Works So Well
whyItWorks.points:
• Our AI analyzes both visual and audio cues to identify scene boundaries with over 95% accuracy.
  • Advanced machine learning models understand context, not just visual changes, for more natural scene detection.
  • Real-time processing allows for immediate feedback and adjustments during filming or editing.

recommendedStyle.title: Recommended Style for Best Results
recommendedStyle.description: To get the most accurate scene detection, we recommend the following style guidelines:
points: Maintain consistent lighting within each scene
Use clear audio markers or clapperboards between takes
Keep camera movements smooth and intentional
Maintain consistent audio levels within scenes

SceneDetection.title: From Raw Footage to Storyboards: AI-Powered Video Analysis
SceneDetection.description: Discover how AI transforms raw video into structured storyboards with automated scene detection and analysis.
SceneDetection.cta: ğŸš€ Ready to bring your storyboard to life with AI? We can provide a full starter kit with example JSONs, ComfyUI workflows, and ffmpeg/AE templates to help you get started.

audio_analysis.speech_text: Let's discuss how AI is transforming video production...

SceneDetection.richStructuredOutputText: Our system generates comprehensive storyboard data with detailed metadata for each scene, giving you complete control over your video content.

advancedUsage.title: Advanced Usage & Customization
advancedUsage.description: The scene detection system is highly customizable to fit different use cases. Here are some advanced features and customization options:

thresholds.title: Custom Scene Detection Thresholds
thresholds.description: Adjust the sensitivity of scene detection by modifying the threshold parameter. Lower values make the detection more sensitive to changes.

aiAnalysis.title: AI-Enhanced Analysis
aiAnalysis.description: Enable AI analysis for more detailed scene understanding and labeling. This requires additional setup with the Ollama server.

outputCustomization.title: Output Customization
outputCustomization.description: Customize the output format and include additional metadata in the generated storyboard.

integration.title: Integration with Other Tools
integration.description: The storyboard output can be easily integrated with other tools and workflows. Here are some examples:

editingSoftware.title: Video Editing Software
editingSoftware.description: Import the JSON output into video editors that support script-based editing

cms.title: Content Management Systems
cms.description: Automatically generate metadata for video assets

aiTraining.title: AI Training Data
aiTraining.description: Use the structured output as training data for machine learning models

Benefitss.title: Benefits
Benefitss.description: The benefits of using our AI-powered scene detection system include:

modularArchitecture.title: Modular Architecture
modularArchitecture.description: The system is built with separate components for video analysis, AI processing, and output generation, making it easy to extend and maintain.

performance.title: Performance Optimized
performance.description: Efficient frame processing and parallelization ensure fast analysis even for long videos.

aiEnhanced.title: AI-Enhanced Analysis
aiEnhanced.description: Optional AI components provide deeper scene understanding and more accurate labeling.

benefits.subtitle: WHY CHOOSE OUR SOLUTION
benefits.title: The Power of AI-Powered Scene Analysis

integration.title: Easy Integration
integration.description: The structured JSON output makes it easy to integrate with other tools and workflows:

comprehensiveData.title: Comprehensive Scene Data
items: Precise timing information for each scene

nanoBananaProPrompts.title: Nano Banana Pro Prompts
nanoBananaProPrompts.description: Discover a collection of creative and effective prompts for your AI content generation needs. These prompts are designed to help you get the most out of your AI tools.

prompts.title: Popular Nano Banana Pro Prompts
prompts.prompt1: Create a short story about a futuristic city where emotions are currency
prompts.prompt2: Generate a dialogue between two characters meeting for the first time in a coffee shop
prompts.prompt3: Write a product description for an innovative AI-powered kitchen gadget
